title: Flat top 3s
content:
Friends,  
We're working through a logo project where we're using numbers as letter forms inside the logo. One of the "letters" is a "3" and we like the flat top 3. Could you recommend any and all of your favorite flat top 3s?  
Thanks!
author: CleverNYC

comments.content:
You didn't specify a style of font. The following are not necessarily "favorites," but they are all typefaces that include flat-topped 3s:

Sans Serif:  
Bureau Grot  
DIN Schriften Neuzeit Grotesque Light  
Felbridge  
Formata BQ  
London Underground  
Neuzeit S  
ITC Panache  
ITC Symbol

Serif:  
Calvert  
Caxton  
Cochin  
Concorde BQ  
Fakt Slab  
Life  
Octavian

To add:

Serif:  
Museo  
Vollkorn  
Walbaum

Sans Serif:  
Antique Olive  
Avenir Next (old-style figures only)  
Classic Grotesque (old-style figures only)  
Gotham  
Museo Sans  
PT Sans  
Transat / Transat Text

Slab Serif:  
American Typewriter  
City  
Museo Slab  
Nexa Slab

Here are my favorites of those that I’ve designed, which all happen to be display faces:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126010215im_/http:/typophile.com/files/threes_4276.png)
  
Alphaville, Eunoia, Fontesque Sans, Merlin, Morphica.
